name: CLEAR_AT_MULTI
displayName: On an Endless Adventure, Once Again!
description: [PSO2] Proof of clearing a quest in Multiplayer. Our adventure is just beginning!  We're counting on you for the next quest!

name: PSE_BURST_OCCURRED
description: [PSO2] Proof of triggering a PSE burst. The rising pillar of light is a sign of benediction! Now the real battle begins!

name: GRIND_ITEM_PLUS10
description: [PSO2] Proof of creating a weapon with a +10 enhancement. The will to never retreat, a spirit that never wavers, and an unbreakable asset.

name: PHOTON_BLAST_INVOKED
description: [PSO2] Proof of triggering a Photon Blast. *Not unlockable in NGS. Release the power that you kindled!

name: TEAM_ROOM_ENTERED
description: [PSO2] Proof of entering an Alliance Quarters. Let's all support each other, until it feels natural for you to be right alongside us.

name: HIGH_SCORE_FOR_DARTS
description: [PSO2] Proof of getting a high score in Trick Darts. Aim your darts at the board over there, and *shunk*!

name: KILL_DRAGON_MAGMA
displayName: Vol Dragon, the Supreme Ruler of Purgatory
description: [PSO2] Proof of killing Vol Dragon. *Restricted to single party areas. May it perish in the fires of the volcano it was dunked in!

name: KILL_DRAGON_CRYSTAL
displayName: Quartz Dragon, Ruler of the Wild Blue Skies
description: [PSO2] Proof of killing Quartz Dragon. *Restricted to single party areas. In its insolence, it personally killed our noble dragons!

name: KILL_PANTHER_A
displayName: Fang Banser, Assassin of the Secret Forest
description: [PSO2] Proof of killing Fang Banser. *Restricted to single party areas. "King of Beasts" refers to those who would first sic others on the enemy before themselves.

name: KILL_BOSS_MECHA_A
description: [PSO2] Proof of destroying Big Varder. *Restricted to single party areas. As always, big launchers on big warships are the stuff of dreams! Although no idea who made it...

name: KILL_SPIDER
displayName: Dark Ragne, Predator of the Abyss
description: [PSO2] Proof of killing Dark Ragne. *Restricted to single party areas. As far as this immensely spacious universe, are they pests, or are they beneficial insects?

name: CHANGE_HUNTER
description: [PSO2] Proof you've changed your Main Class to a Hunter of Level 30 or higher. Yeah, you know Hunters are the best! Don't bother being a Force! They always need to be protected.

name: CHANGE_RANGER
displayName: Turned Into an Archer Wielding Flames
description: [PSO2] Proof you've changed your Main Class to a Ranger of Level 30 or higher. Rangers are awesome! Heh heh! Let's make pincushions out of every last little enemy!

name: CHANGE_FORCE
displayName: Turned Into a Creator of All Things
description: [PSO2] Proof you've changed your Main Class to a Force of Level 30 or higher. Yeah, being a Force is the best after all... Being a Hunter is nothing but hot, sweaty work.

name: CHANGE_FIGHTER
description: [PSO2] Proof you've changed your Main Class to a Fighter of Level 30 or higher. Being a Fighter ain't bad, either! It's a fine choice! Just watch out for Techters!

name: CHANGE_GUNNER
displayName: Turned Into a Musketeer Bearing Meteors
description: [PSO2] Proof you've changed your Main Class to a Gunner of Level 30 or higher. Being a Gunner's a nice! Watch enemies dance while you shoot 'em more holes than a honeycomb!

name: CHANGE_TECHER
displayName: Turned Into One Who Controls Domains
description: [PSO2] Proof you've changed your Main Class to a Techter of Level 30 or higher. Being a Techter's great. Fighter is out of the question. They get in the way of the rays we shoot.

name: CLEAR_WITH_CUNA
description: [PSO2] Proof of clearing a quest with Quna. Did you watch me on stage!? ...Huh, you couldn't really see me because of my invisibility power?

name: KILL_DP_HUMAN
displayName: Falz Hyunal, the Jet Black Beacon
description: [PSO2] Proof of killing Falz Hyunal. *Restricted to single party areas. If one who fights humans take a human form, isn't it because human forms are the strongest to take?

name: KILL_DRAGON_BERSERK_A
description: [PSO2] Proof of killing Chrome Dragon. *Restricted to single party areas. There are no assailants to be found. For here, there are only victims.

name: GRIND_ITEM_FAILED
displayName: That's Amazingly Bad Luck You've Got There
description: [PSO2] Proof of having failed at Armor Enhancement. Think about it this way: At least this means you have meseta to burn, right?

name: PHOTON_BLAST_EP2_INVOKED
description: [PSO2] Proof of triggering an Troy-type Photon Blast from an extremely enraged Mag. Its Photon Blast is awoken by its intense anger, even while it maintains its calm demeanor...

name: KILL_MARINE_OARFISH
displayName: Bar Lodos, Conqueror of the Raging Currents
description: [PSO2] Proof of killing Bar Lodos. *Restricted to single party areas. Placid seas can hardly forge experienced sailors. Every crisis is an opportunity!

name: CHANGE_BRAVER
displayName: Turned Into a Master of Opportunities
description: [PSO2] Proof you've changed your Main Class to a Braver of Level 30 or higher. Yes, the new class, the Braver! Become a Braver today!

name: HIDE_AND_SEEK
description: [PSO2] Find the hidden Lillipan hiding out in the Casino. "Lin... (they found me)!"

name: KILL_MONO_YOROI
displayName: Gigur Gunnegam, the Demon of the Frozen Ice
description: [PSO2] Proof of killing Gigur Gunnegam. *Restricted to single party areas. If a divine punishment awaits him, then let him have it!

name: CHANGE_BOUNCER
description: [PSO2] Proof you've changed your Main Class to a Bouncer of Level 30 or higher. Surely it was fate that you'd become a Bouncer! Please, by all means, tell me your orders!

name: CLEAR_EP4
description: [PSO2] Proof of clearing the EPISODE 4 Story Quest, "The Time of Awakening." Search for worlds yet unseen.

name: KILL_TRAIN
displayName: Train Gidran, the Phantom Runaway Train
description: [PSO2] Proof of destroying Train Gidran. *Restricted to single party areas. There's no lying about how scary that was…

name: CHANGE_SUMMONER
description: [PSO2] Proof you've changed your Main Class to a Summoner of Level 30 or higher. The Summoner, who can be with their beloved children even on the battlefield, is the most elegant!

name: CLEAR_EP5
description: [PSO2] Proof of clearing the EPISODE 5 Story Quest, "Seeking the Hand of Salvation." And now, the doorway to a new world shall be opened.

name: CLEAR_OMNIBUS
description: [PSO2] Proof of clearing the EPISODE 1 Story Quest, "An Encounter with Xion." Sooo... what kinds of records can we see from here? I've got a feeling it's going to be really fun!

name: CHANGE_HERO
description: [PSO2] Proof you've changed your Main Class to a Hero. Everyone in ARKS is a Hero! Now let's go show the world!

name: CLEAR_EP6
description: [PSO2] Proof of clearing the EPISODE 6 Story Quest, "Goddess' Prelude". No one is privy to the true ending.

name: KILL_CYPHER
description: [PSO2] Proof of destroying a luminmech. *Restricted to single party areas. Marvels manipulated by the Photoners.

name: CHANGE_VILLAIN
displayName: Turned Into a Phantom Amidst Shadow
description: [PSO2] Proof you've changed your Main Class to Phantom. So you want power? Best seek the power of the "Phantom"…

name: PSE_BURST_NGS_OCCURRED
description: [NGS] Proof of causing PSE Bursts in PSO2:NGS. Can you fight your way through?

name: KILL_GD_BOX
description: [NGS] Proof of defeating Nogleth. The beatings won't stop until they apologize.

name: KILL_GD_DRA
description: [NGS] Proof of defeating Nex Aelio. Bringing peace to Aelio is what ARKS defenders do.

name: GRIND_ITEM_MULTI_WEAPON
description: [NGS] Proof of creating a Multi-weapon in PSO2:NGS. All hail ARKS's multi-purpose innovation!

name: JOIN_PARTY_NGS
description: [NGS] Proof of forming a party with other players in PSO2:NGS. Strength through diversity.

name: CHANGE_NGS_MAIN
description: [NGS] Proof of reaching Level 20 with any class in PSO2:NGS. ARKS defenders, reach for the stars!
